summary: Implements a 2‑D depthwise convolution layer that processes each input channel independently with its own kernel, optionally expanding channels via a depth multiplier and supporting stride, padding, dilation, activation, bias, initializers, regularizers and constraints, while handling both channels‑last and channels‑first data formats.
business_intent: Enable efficient channel‑wise convolution as the first step of depthwise separable convolutions, allowing model size reduction and computational speed‑up in deep‑learning architectures.
